rating.position_text: The organization's athletes show quite good results in training and competitions

popup.address_content: 930293, Altai Krai, Barnaul, Socialist Avenue, 28 office 220
popup.about_content: „The Altai Krai Sports Organization“ is a dynamic association of sports enthusiasts who are dedicated to the development and popularization of wrestling in the region. Our mission is to create conditions for professional growth and achievements of athletes, as well as to involve young people in an active lifestyle through sports. We organize trainings, competitions and events aimed at developing the physical and moral qualities of participants.

rating_section.title: Rating: Very high
rating_section.text: The organization's athletes show fairly good results in training and competitions, and have also steadily risen in the rankings over the past year.
